Hy everyone.
I would like to thanks Gordon by the previous answer about rob=
ots policy.
I was trying to create a new job with the cmdline based on a de=
fined
profile and using the same seeds that the profile have defined. The
p=
roblem is that the option of addJobBasedon takes 4 parameters and are
the n=
ame of the profile, the name of the new job, it's descriptions
and the seed=
s, in this case i can't define a seeds.txt file, only let
me introduce the =
urls seeds.
I made a search an i found in heritrix 2.0 an option that let m=
e do
this with the command launchProfile. I was using heritrix 1.14.1 and
t=
hat option is unavailable.
In heritrix 1.14 how can i do that? 
It's imposi=
ble?

Regards
